member.name: P:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.GlobalAppsSection.DataStorePath
member.summary: Retrieves relative path to the xml file that contains Global application settings then replaces the relative path with the absolute path of the application directory + the file name. Relative path is stored in QualPro_Params table.
member.author: Arman Mnatsakanyan

member.name: P:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.GlobalAppsSection.AdminGroupList
member.summary: Returns comma separated list of admin groups from QualPro_Params table.
member.author: Arman Mnatsakanyan

member.name: T:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.GlobalAppsSection
member.summary: This class used to read settings from app.config. The revised version reads the settings from QualPro_Params table.

member.name: P:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Nrc.LaunchPad.Library.GlobalProvider.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
